meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of vivisection.
meanings.sent1: The vivisectional experiments were conducted in a sterile laboratory setting.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's vivisectional approach to research raised ethical concerns.
meanings.sent3: The vivisectional study on frogs hopped its way into the headlines.
meanings.sent4: Her vivisectional analysis of the data revealed unexpected patterns.
meanings.sent5: The vivid images from the vivisectional procedure stayed with me for days.

meanings.sent1: The vivisectional research team carefully monitored the animals' reactions.
meanings.sent2: The controversial scientist was known for his vivisectional methods.
meanings.sent3: The vivisectional demonstration at the conference left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her vivisectional approach to biology class made learning engaging.
meanings.sent5: The vivisectional techniques used in the experiment were groundbreaking.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the dissection of living animals.
meanings.sent1: The vivisectional examination revealed the inner workings of the organism.
meanings.sent2: The ethical debate centered around the vivisectional practices in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The vivisectional lesson in biology class made students squirm.
meanings.sent4: His vivisectional skills in the operating room were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The vivisectional procedure provided valuable insights into animal anatomy.
